rukus.text: Is it still not apparent to those who inherited the earth from the previous generations, that if We pleased We could punish them too for their sins. We could stamp a seal on their hearts, so they could hear nothing

We narrate to you the stories of these towns. Their messengers certainly brought them the clear proofs. But they (just) would not believe the message they had already rejected earlier. Thus, Allah stamps a seal on the hearts of the unbelievers
In most of them, We did not find (any commitment to) the covenant. We found most of them to be the defiant evildoers
Then, after them We raised Musa and sent him with Our signs to the pharaoh and his chiefs. But they were unjust, and rejected the signs. So observe how (severe) was the outcome for the evildoers
Musa said, "Oh pharaoh! I am certainly the messenger from the Lord of the universe
It is not befitting for me to say anything concerning Allah except the truth. I have brought you the clear proofs from my Lord. So let the children of Israel accompany me
The pharaoh said, "If you are telling the truth, and if you have really brought the sign, then present it
So, Musa threw down his staff and suddenly it became a real live serpent
He pulled out his hand (from his pocket) and it appeared dazzling white to the viewers
